post.body: So here's what it looks like under Merged for me, I'm assuming that's correct.

comment.body: @Pexo: Hey where can I find the seeded hubs section? This page is pretty confusing to me
@Pexo: That is what I meant. Thanks. I'm still a bit new to Zeronet so I don't exactly know the navigation yet but I found it now. Guessing most things are on the homepage once you download them then
@Pexo: But I'm still a bit confused on where to find the actual content. When I click Pedohub under "MERGED: ZEROME" it just goes to the page telling you what to do to log in

@Pexo: Hmm, So when I go to ZeroHello I go down to the Merged Section and I see two things. ZeroMe User Registry and Pedohub. I've updated both of them and so then I go onto Zerome and I don't see anything. It's the same account but I'll try messing around with it a bit more
